projects.title: Leonardo Dicaprio
projects.descrip: Portfolio site for Leonardo dicaprio Showcasing his career as a high profile actor as well as promoting his foundation to protect people, animals and the planet.

projects.title: bebe
projects.descrip: Building on the bebe brand by creating look-books for the “Addiction” and “Kim Kardashian” clothing and jewelry lines as well as updating their ecommerce website.

projects.title: Qcera
projects.descrip: Creating a unified brand for the software company with a new logo design, packaging, stationary and completely redesigning their website.

projects.title: Flash Factory
projects.descrip: Created various flash templated websites focusing on people of trade including photographers, musicians, artists and small business owners.

projects.title: Nestlé
projects.descrip: Designed online experiences promoting various product lines under the Nestle brand including Lean Cuisine, Dreyer’s, Haagen-Dazs, Skinny Cow, Coffee Mate, Nescafe and Nesquik.

projects.title: Disney
projects.descrip: Designed e-commerce brand engagement pages for various Disney projects including Cars 2, Toy Story, Winnie the Poo, Mickey Mouse and a central hub for their Disney Princess characters.
